fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 55.10 points or 0.28% to settle at 19,310.15. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.79% to 12.14. Reliance Industries (RIL), Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
